briefTitle: Gel-200 Extension and Open-Label Study in Osteoarthritis of the Knee
officialTitle: A Multi-Center Extension and Open-Label Study of a Single or Repeat Intra-Articular Injection of Gel-200 in Osteoarthritis of the Knee.
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if a single or repeat intra-articular injection of Gel-200 is safe and effective in subjects with symptomatic osteoarthritis of the knee and to determine if original SI-6606/01 Gel-200 therapy is durable beyond the original study.

primaryOutcome.measure: Occurrence of Systemic and Local Adverse Events Following a Single or Repeat Intra-articular Injection of Gel-200
